How to develop a formatter

You just need to create a module that exports an object with a method named format(). This method will receive an array of messages if any issues have been found.

The following is a basic formatter that just .stringify() the array into the console:

A message looks like this:

With this, you can group the issues by resource and sort them by line and column. Using the previous example and lodash will look as follows:

You can always check the code of any of the official formatters for more complex scenarios.
